nodes.text: The Nautolan tranquillity bracelet was a bracelet made of smooth and slick coral beads arranged on a chain. One such bracelet was worn by Jedi Knight Aryn Leneer during the occurrence of the Sacking of Coruscant in the year 3653 BBY. It was given to her by her Jedi Master, Ven Zallow, when she earned the rank of Jedi Knight. She would sometimes use the bracelet in an attempt to help calm herself, while also calling on the Force.

The Nautolan tranquillity bracelet first appeared in Paul S. Kemp's novel The Old Republic: Deceived, which was released in 2011. Although the Nautolans are a species in Star Wars, Deceived does not state that the bracelet had any connection to the species.
